analysis.key_quote: Turning these public servants' jobs into political appointments will allow these jobs to be handed out to folks with conflicts of interest, who may have no background or expertise (or willingness) to do the job, or who actively want to dismantle the offices they serve from within.
analysis.rationale: The comment opposes the proposed rule by highlighting concerns about politicization and the potential loss of expertise in critical roles, emphasizing the importance of maintaining a merit-based system for public servants.
